headline.main: NEWMAN CLUBS CHEER FISH'S TALK ON WAR; He Holds Most of Crowd in Debate With Chanler

lead_paragraph: The issue of American intervention in the war was debated yesterday by Corporation Counsel William C. Chanter, and advocate of aid to the Allies, and Representative Hamilton Fish Jr., isolationist, at a meeting of the Newman Club Federation, Catholic student group, at the Corpus Christi Church auditorium, 535 West 121st Street.
abstract: War entry debated by Corp Counsel W C Chanler and Repr Fish, Newman Club Fed; Fish repts poll shows 90% of R C priests oppose war entry and aid to USSR
